name: Chronicles of Etia: A Yuletide Story
storyline:
This is the second prelude game leading up to the future Chronicles of Etia game. It will continue on from the first episode that has been released. There will be two more released after this that will introduce the other characters and also more of the lore around the game world.

The game starts off some time after Samhain (Halloween) and the story commences the day before Yule. It is a story of magic, awakenings and also evil fairies.

I hope you enjoy it.
summary: This is the second game from the Chronicles of Etia: A Samhain Story. It is a story that happens at Yule and is a story of magic, mystery and evil fairies. A story to get you into the festive spirit.
